page.title: 06LIFE ON THE SANDFORD ESTATE
page.content: WE CARRIED OUT 2 SURVEYS.THERE IS AN AVERAGE OF 4.8 PEOPLE IN EACH HOUSE.MOST PUPILS LIVE IN COUNCILL HOUSES.OF THOSE IN WORK,MOST ARE IN SURVACE INDUSTRY AND A THIRD ARE UNEMPLOYED.MOST PEOLPE WERE BORN IN LEEDS. { }4 PEOPLE WHO HAVE LIVED ON THE ESTATE FOR OVER 30 YEARS SAID THAT THE AREA HAD DETERIORATED BECAUSE OF THE VANDALS.BUT HELP FOR THE ELDERLY HAD IMPROVED.THE PLAYGROUND GAMES CHILDREN PLAY HAVEN'T CHANGED,MARBLES,TAG AND SKIPPING.HERE IS A SKIPPING RHYME NOT LAST LAST NIGHT BUT THE NIGHT BEFORE 24 ROBBRES CAME KNOCKING AT MY DOOR.AS I WENT TO LET THEN IN THIS IS WHAT THEY SAID TO ME SPANISH LADY TURN AROUND SPANISH LADY DO THE SPLITS SPANISH LADY 2,4,6
